title: CozmicGo
description:
CozmicGo connects celebrities & influencers to eventgoers to bring social media into the real world.

I designed, developed, and deployed over 120 features as the product manager amongst 6 developers, increasing sprint velocity 70%.

Key features I worked on include a transactional database system, encrypted check-ins, and a mutual friends algorithmn. As a PM, I led scrums; defined framework, backend, and app teams; and coordinated dev efforts on larger features.

title: BoxletAdmin
description:
The BoxletAdmin iOS app provides business automation & reporting for Boxlet Storage, an AirBnB for Storage. 

Working with nontechnical members of our team, I define admin processes, then provide an interface for server-side financial and database adjustment.

Both statistical reporting and admin services are provided by the app. Deployed securely via a NodeJS deployment server.

title: Boxlet - React
description:
Boxlet Storage, an AirBnB for Storage, needed a responsive, web counterpart to its mobile apps.

I PM'ed the React Web Client for Boxlet. I ensured that we could ship a booking-only MVP within 2 weeks, and the rest of the product functionality within 2 months.

I also architected the application's infrastructure to protect against DDOS-ing our API, regulate data access control, and data separation across our deployment pipeline.

title: Boxlet - API
description:
The Boxlet RESTful API provides the backend logic that keeps all Boxlet services alive. 

I was the lead developer of the Boxlet API.

title: ARMDevSuite
description:
The ARMDevSuite is a custom cocoapod composed of 12 libraries. 

7 are UI Framework libraries that conform to protocol-delegate design & rapidly increase the speed of app teams. The remainder are logic libraries that provide easy APIs for data model manipulation. 

WIP - documentation required.
